Posts.EditableText: `JS.ShowGrid` sets the height of the map. Setting it to zero hides it, but setting it to 1 will turn it on, 1 pixel high! Try `JS.ShowGrid (300)`
Posts.HTML: JS.ShowGrid sets the height of the map. Setting it to zero hides it, but setting it to 1 will turn it on, 1 pixel high! Try JS.ShowGrid (300)
